titles.title: To extend the temporary duty suspension on C12-18 Alkenes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/26/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the suspension, through December 31, 2008, of the duty on C12-18 alkenes, polymers (TPX) with 4-methyl-1-pentene.
